title: Textile, ca. 1860
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: block printed on plain weave with grouped warps causing weft floats
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 132 x 68 cm (51 15/16 x 26 3/4 in.)
description:
Cartouches of flowers on a brown, mossy background. Roses, anemones, ferns and cineraria.
A large number of small blocks were used.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1860.
ca. 1860. Medium: wool
Technique: block printed on plain weave with grouped warps causing weft floats. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1968-135-98.
